verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] lay a wreath at Arlington National Cemetery on Monday to honor fallen service members .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: lay] [ARG1: a wreath] [ARGM-LOC: at Arlington National Cemetery] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-PRP: to honor fallen service members] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] will lay a wreath at Arlington National Cemetery on Monday to [V: honor] [ARG1: fallen service members] .
President Donald Trump will lay a wreath at Arlington National Cemetery on Monday to honor [V: fallen] [ARG1: service members] .
